page.title: 14ORGANIZED LEISURE 1
page.content: On Wednesdays and Fridays I go to karate.It is held at the Hampden Park sports centre.It costs two pounds a week.For the first half hour we do excercises and then an hours karate training and there is an extra half an hour for the people who are more advanced.I go with my friend in his dad's car. There are about thirty one people doing karate with me. {By Jonathon Farmer age 10} Every week I go to a church youth club,it costs 20p to get in and 50p to be a member.Inside the youth club there is a snooker table,table tennis and a dart board.There is a canteen for refreshments. Sometimes they take us down to the park or other places. Sometimes we do sponsered walks to raise money for the youth club. { By Owen Simpson age 10
